classes.title: Introduction to Programming
classes.description: Learn the basic concepts of programming.

classes.title: Web Development Basics
classes.description: Understand the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

classes.title: Frontend Development
classes.description: Learn about modern frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular.

classes.title: Backend Development
classes.description: Discuss Node.js, Express, Django, or Flask.

classes.title: Database Management
classes.description: Learn to use SQL, MongoDB, or Firebase.

classes.title: Project Development
classes.description: Guide students through building a project from start to finish.

classes.title: Code Review & Refactoring
classes.description: Teach strategies to improve code quality.

classes.title: Interview Preparation
classes.description: Prepare students for real-world job interviews.
